name: RF Tools
description:
RF Tools is your swiss-army knife for any Radio Frequency calculations, conversions and reference.

Wavelength calculator
Link Budget calculator
Fresnel Zone calculator
Path Loss calculator
Resonance calculator
Coaxial Cable Loss Calculator
and more.

name: Steam ID Viewer
description:
The simplest, direct-to-the-point Steam ID Viewer app on the Windows Store. Use it to search and convert your ID into other Steam ID forms:

steamID, steamID3, steamID64, steamID32, etc

*This app is neither related to Steam nor Valve.

name: ZIP Code PH
description:
Missing ZIP Codes when you have to fill out forms for sending mail, letters, packages to the Philippines?

ZIP Code PH provides you the complete list of ZIP codes of all municipalities, cities and major places of the Philippines.

You can take it anywhere you want because it's OFFLINE too!

name: Your Phone Tray
description: Launch Your Phone app from the system tray (single click) or double click to navigate to messages quickly.

name: Tagalog Bible
description:
FIL: Ang Tagalog Bible (Ang Bagong Tipan), ang pinaka-simpleng tagalog bible sa Windows Store. Maaari mo nang mabasa ang magandang balita kahit saan at kahit kailan.

EN: Tagalog Bible (Ang Bagong Tipan), the simplest Tagalog Bible app you can find in the Store. View the Good Word anytime and anywhere you are.

name: RPN Internet Radio
description:
The unofficial app for streaming the reputed AM radio stations of Radio Philippines Network from the Philippines.

Listen live for news, talk-shows, interviews, tips, etc right from the app, no need for AM antennas, just have an internet connection and listen on the go.

RPN AM stations are located in various parts of the Philippine archipelago:
DZRL Batac, DZBS Baguio, DZKI Iriga, DYKC Cebu, DYKB Bacolod, DXKS Surigao, DXKO Cagayan de Oro, DXDX General Santos, DXKD Dipolog, DXKT Davao, DXXX Zamboanga

name: SubQuests
description:
Challenge yourself with Subnetting Questions straight from the simple and useful website www.subnettingquestions.com

This app scrapes off the questions for you to answer straight from your Windows 10 device.

Feel free to support me by donating thru PayPal or contact me for other ways you can help. Otherwise enjoy the app and good luck Subnetting!
